PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_UnitaryEquipmentTypeAirHandler
PropertySetDef.Definition: Air handler unitary equipment type attributes. Note that these attributes were formerly Pset_AirHandler prior to IFC2x2.

PropertyDef.Name: AirHandlerConstruction
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration defining how the air handler might be fabricated.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 空調機の組立方法の定義の列挙

PropertyDef.Name: AirHandlerFanCoilArrangement
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration defining the arrangement of the supply air fan and the cooling coil.

NameAliases.NameAlias: 空調機ファン・コイル配列

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 給気ファンと冷却コイルの配置の定義列挙

PropertyDef.Name: DualDeck
PropertyDef.Definition: Does the AirHandler have a dual deck? TRUE = Yes, FALSE = No.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 空調機は2層になっているか TRUE=はい、FALSE=Iいいえ

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: エアハンドリングユニットのプロパティ属性設定。
